suffering from or relating to gout (= a painful diseases that makes the hands, feet, and knees swell): Acute gout, or gouty arthritis, is a form of arthritis that causes sudden attacks of tenderness and pain in the joints. The only revenge the princess took upon her aunt was to tread pretty hard on her gouty toe. See
gout
More examplesFewer examplesThis drug is for joint pain and swelling due to attacks of acute gouty arthritis.We may overlook the fact that a chronically gouty joint is more susceptible to infection.I fell, hurting my gouty foot and breaking the blue vase Auntie Dolly gave us for Christmas.
